pricing.title: Plans and pricing
pricing.subtitle: Whether you're sending large files for work or sharing your creative projects, we have the right plan for you.
pricing.chooseTitle: Choose the plan that's right for you
pricing.chooseSubtitle: Compare all features of our plans

free.name: Free
free.description: To get started with basic sharing

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our plans and services

0.question: What happens after I sign up and pay?
0.answer: After payment, your plan is activated immediately. You'll have access to all features included in your chosen plan and can start sending files right away.

1.question: Do my recipients need to sign up?
1.answer: No, recipients don't need to sign up to download files. They'll receive a download link via email, or you can share the link directly.

2.question: Can I receive larger transfers from anyone?
2.answer: Yes, anyone can send you files through FlyFile. The maximum transfer size depends on the sender's plan.

3.question: How can I add (and remove) team members?
3.answer: With the Business plan, you can manage team members from the dashboard. Go to Team > Invite member to add new users, or remove them from the members list.

4.question: What payment methods can I use?
4.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through Stripe. Payment is secure and encrypted.

5.question: What happens if I exceed my storage limit?
5.answer: If you reach your plan's storage limit, you won't be able to upload new files until the monthly renewal or until you upgrade to a higher plan.

6.question: Can I change plans at any time?
6.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect on the next billing cycle.

7.question: Do you offer discounts for annual payments?
7.answer: Yes, paying annually gives you a 20% discount on all plans.

hero.title: Your security is our
hero.subtitle: Enterprise security standards, GDPR compliance and military-grade encryption to protect your most important data.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.subtitle: Every file is protected with the same encryption used by banks and governments. Your data is safe, always.
encryption.aesDescription: We use the AES-256 encryption standard, the same used by the American government for top-secret documents. Each file receives a unique encryption key that is automatically generated.
encryption.uniqueKeys: Unique keys for each individual file
encryption.secureDecrypt: Secure decryption at the time of authorized download
encryption.step1Desc: The file is encrypted on our server before storage
encryption.step2Desc: The encrypted file is stored securely
encryption.step3Desc: The file is decrypted only at the time of authorized download

features.title: Security Features
features.subtitle: 360-degree protection for every aspect of your file sharing.

secureTransfer.title: Secure Transfers
secureTransfer.description: All communications occur via HTTPS with SSL/TLS certificates to ensure data in transit is always protected.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Control who can access your files with password protection, automatic expiration and download limitations.

monitoring.title: Security Monitoring
monitoring.description: We continuously monitor access to your files and provide you with detailed logs to track every activity.

compliance.title: Compliance and Standards
compliance.subtitle: We comply with European data protection regulations and implement the best security practices.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: Fully compliant with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation.

aes.title: AES-256 Encryption
aes.description: Banking-grade encryption standard to protect all your files in transit and at rest.

eu.title: Servers in Europe
eu.description: Your data is stored on European servers with Cloudflare global CDN for optimal performance.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Security
infrastructure.subtitle: Our infrastructure is designed with multi-layer security to protect your data at every level.

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.description: We use Cloudflare R2 for file storage, guaranteeing global speed and enterprise reliability.

network.title: Network Security
network.description: Multi-layer protection with advanced firewalls, intrusion detection systems and continuous monitoring.

bestPractices.title: Security Best Practices
bestPractices.subtitle: Tips to maximize the security of your file transfers with FlyFile.

expiry.description: Set quick expirations to reduce the exposure window

ctaSection.title: Guaranteed Security for Your Data
ctaSection.subtitle: Trust the most secure file sharing platform. Start today with maximum protection for your sensitive data.

hero.subtitle: FlyFile was born with a clear mission: to make file sharing accessible to everyone, without compromising the security of your data.

mission.label: Our mission
mission.title: We believe privacy is a right, not a privilege
mission.subtitle: Too often, file sharing means giving up control over your data. With FlyFile, we wanted to create something different: a platform where security and simplicity go hand in hand, accessible to everyone.
mission.leftP1: FlyFile was born in Milan from the belief that sharing files should not be complicated or insecure. Every day, millions of people send important documents through platforms that do not guarantee adequate protection.
mission.leftP2: We built FlyFile starting from encryption: every file is encrypted with the AES-256 standard before it even leaves your device. It's not an option, it's how we work.
mission.rightP1: Our platform is designed for professionals, teams and businesses that need to transfer large files quickly, reliably and in compliance with European privacy regulations.
mission.rightP2: With servers in Europe and full GDPR compliance, your data never leaves the continent and is never sold or shared. Your privacy is our priority.

values.label: Our values
values.title: What we build FlyFile on
values.subtitle: Four principles that guide every decision, from product design to data management.

security.title: Security first
security.description: Every file transferred with FlyFile is protected with AES-256 end-to-end encryption. Your data is safe, always.

simplicity.title: Simplicity without compromise
simplicity.description: Sharing files should be simple. No mandatory registration, no complex procedures. Upload, share, done.

teams.title: Built for teams
teams.description: Advanced dashboards, member management, detailed analytics. Everything your team needs to collaborate effectively.

privacy.title: European privacy
privacy.description: Servers in Europe, GDPR compliance and maximum transparency. Your data is never sold or shared with third parties.

company.label: Our company
company.title: A product of I-Creativi
company.description: FlyFile is developed and maintained by I-Creativi, a digital agency based in Milan. We design technology solutions that put the user at the center.

apiReference.getTokenDesc: Generate an API token from your user dashboard in the "API Settings" section (requires Business plan).

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about FlyFile and its features.
faq.a1: Every file uploaded to FlyFile is encrypted with AES-256 using a unique automatically generated key. The file is encrypted on our server before being stored and is decrypted only when an authorized user downloads it. This ensures that not even we can access the contents of your files.
faq.a2: Individual file size is unlimited on all plans. The limit concerns the monthly quota: Free (5GB/month), Starter (300GB/month), Pro (500GB/month), Business (unlimited). Each plan also has a monthly transfer limit.
faq.a3: Yes, all files have an automatic expiration based on your plan: Free (5 days), Starter (7 days), Pro (30 days), Business (1 year). With Pro and Business plans you can customize the expiration. Once expired, files are permanently deleted.
faq.q4: Can I integrate FlyFile into my systems?
faq.a4: Yes! With the Business plan you have access to our complete REST API with Bearer Token authentication and webhooks for real-time notifications. Complete documentation is available in the API Reference section of this page.
faq.a5: Yes, FlyFile is fully GDPR compliant and meets other international data protection standards. We have implemented all necessary technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of personal data and respect users' rights.
